title: Immaculate bright remodeled home- Cupertino Schools- Best value
posting_body: Absolutely beautiful 3BR/2Ba,1450 sqft home-owner unit of a Duplex.
Cupertino schools.
Highly desirable, Airy and sunny.
Fully updated and refreshed.
Quiet, single-story, with one car garage.
Private fenced backyard with mature trees.
Wood/ tile flooring.
Open-floor plan and a huge living room and a separate family room with a fireplace.
All new dual-pane windows.
The newly remodeled kitchen includes plenty of cabinet space and appliances including a new dishwasher and a new huge, steel refrigerator, new stove, new microwave.
Washer and dryer are included and inside the garage.
High-efficiency appliances and LED lighting throughout.
Amenities include front porch and patio, central heating and air conditioning, large master bedroom suite with patio door to Backyard and remodeled bathroom, Ceiling fans in all rooms.
Wired for internet, cable and satellite, plenty of storage space.
Available to qualified tenants.
Rent is $3695 per month includes Trash and gardener.
Tenant pays utilities (Water, Electric, Gas), Trash is included and .
Minimum 1 yr lease is required.
One month rent deposit is required.
Cupertino Schools: De Vargas Elementary, Hyde Middle, Cupertino High
Close to Challenger, Harker Middle / High and Champion schools.
Strictly Non-Smoking, No Pets.
Easy access to Hwy-280, 85, and Lawrence Expressway and public transport (VTA), minutes from Santana Row and all types of shopping and Apple campus.
Showing by appointment, open house is on Weekends.
Direct inquiries only at
